name: LifeLine (NoAverageJ0E)
description:
LifeLine is short game about a life lived from left to right.

Web Version Controls:

Menu:
Up/Down Arrow keys + Enter to make selection. ESC to go back.
(Pressing ESC while at the main menu will kill the game entirely, refresh the page to get it back)

Main Game:
Right Arrow Key to walk on. There is no going backward. You may stop and enjoy the scenery.

Other keys may do things on the menu, but maybe not..
